com.server.code

Class quickChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.server.code.quickChart

  • public class quickChart
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will send data to the http://quickchart.io/ and generate the score chart

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      quickChart() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String chartData(java.lang.String[][] data)
      This method will generate the scoreboard as a bar chart for the all players.
      java.lang.String chartScore(java.lang.String score)
      This method will generate the player score as a doughnut chart.
      java.lang.String gameChart(java.lang.String[][] data)
      This method will generate the player score board by sending the data to the QuickChart web service
      java.lang.String scoreChart(java.lang.String sco)
      This method will generate the player score chart by sending the data to the QuickChart web service

      • quickChart

    • Method Detail

      • chartData

        public java.lang.String chartData(java.lang.String[][] data)
        This method will generate the scoreboard as a bar chart for the all players.
        Parameters:
        data - contains the player names and their marks in 2D array
        Returns:
        the generated chart

      • chartScore

        public java.lang.String chartScore(java.lang.String score)
        This method will generate the player score as a doughnut chart.
        Parameters:
        score - contains the player score
        Returns:
        the generated chart

      • gameChart

        public java.lang.String gameChart(java.lang.String[][] data)
        This method will generate the player score board by sending the data to the QuickChart web service
        Parameters:
        data - contains the player names and scores
        Returns:
        URL of the chart as a String

      • scoreChart

        public java.lang.String scoreChart(java.lang.String sco)
        This method will generate the player score chart by sending the data to the QuickChart web service
        Parameters:
        sco - contains the player score
        Returns:
        URL of the chart as a String
